module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.css$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          {
            loader: "css-loader",
            options: { importLoaders: 1 },
          },
          {
            loader: "postcss-loader",
            options: {
              postcssOptions: {
                plugins: [
                  [
                    "postcss-preset-env",
                    {
                      // é€‰é¡¹
                    },
                  ],
                ],
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

CSS Modules

ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯ CSS Modulesï¼Ÿè¯· é˜…è¯»ã€‚

åœ¨ postcss-loader ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰é¢å¤–çš„è®¾ç½®ã€‚ ä¸ºäº†ä½¿ä»–ä»¬æ­£å¸¸å·¥ä½œï¼Œè¯·æ·»åŠ  css-loader çš„ importLoaders é€‰é¡¹ã€‚

webpack.config.js

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.css$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          {
            loader: "css-loader",
            options: {
              modules: true,
              importLoaders: 1,
            },
          },
          "postcss-loader",
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

CSS-in-JS and postcss-js

ä½ éœ€è¦å®‰è£… postcss-jsï¼š

npm install --save-dev postcss-js

å¦‚æœä½ æƒ³å¤„ç†å†™åœ¨ JavaScript ä¸­çš„æ ·å¼ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä½ éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ postcss-js parserã€‚

webpack.config.js

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.style.js$/,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          {
            loader: "css-loader",
            options: {
              importLoaders: 2,
            },
          },
          {
            loader: "postcss-loader",
            options: {
              postcssOptions: {
                parser: "postcss-js",
              },
              execute: true,
            },
          },
          "babel-loader",
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ä½ å°±å¯ä»¥åƒä¸‹é¢è¿™æ ·ä¹¦å†™æ ·å¼äº†

import colors from "./styles/colors";

export default {
  ".menu": {
    color: colors.main,
    height: 25,
    "&_link": {
      color: "white",
    },
  },
};

:warning: å¦‚æœä½ æ­£åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨ Babelä¸”ä¸ºäº†ç¨‹åºæ­£å¸¸å·¥ä½œï¼Œä½ éœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œä¸‹é¢çš„æ­¥éª¤ï¼š

  1. æ·»åŠ  babel-plugin-add-module-exports åˆ°ä½ çš„é…ç½®ä¸­ã€‚
  2. ä½ éœ€è¦åœ¨æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ ·å¼æ¨¡å—ä¸­æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªé»˜è®¤å¯¼å‡ºã€‚

æå– CSS

ä½¿ç”¨ mini-css-extract-pluginã€‚

webpack.config.js

const isProductionMode = process.env.NODE_ENV === "production";

const MiniCssExtractPlugin = require("mini-css-extract-plugin");

module.exports = {
  mode: isProductionMode ? "production" : "development",
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.css$/,
        use: [
          isProductionMode ? MiniCssExtractPlugin.loader : "style-loader",
          "css-loader",
          "postcss-loader",
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
  plugins: [
    new MiniCssExtractPlugin({
      filename: isProductionMode ? "[name].[contenthash].css" : "[name].css",
    }),
  ],
};

è§¦å‘èµ„æºæ‰“åŒ…

è¦å°†èµ„æºä» PostCSS æ’ä»¶å†™åˆ° webpackï¼Œéœ€è¦å‘ result.messages ä¸­æ·»åŠ ä¸€æ¡æ¶ˆæ¯ã€‚

ä¸€æ¡ç¬¦åˆè§„èŒƒçš„æ¶ˆæ¯åº”è¯¥åŒ…å«ä¸‹é¢çš„å­—æ®µï¼š

  • type = asset - æ¶ˆæ¯ç±»å‹ï¼ˆå¿…éœ€å­—æ®µï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”åº”è¯¥ä¸º assetï¼‰
  • file - æ–‡ä»¶åç§°ï¼ˆå¿…éœ€ï¼‰
  • content - æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹ï¼ˆå¿…éœ€ï¼‰
  • sourceMap - sourceMap
  • info - èµ„æºä¿¡æ¯

webpack.config.js

const customPlugin = () => (css, result) => {
  result.messages.push({
    type: "asset",
    file: "sprite.svg",
    content: "<svg>...</svg>",
  });
};

const postcssPlugin = postcss.plugin("postcss-assets", customPlugin);

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.css$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          "css-loader",
          {
            loader: "postcss-loader",
            options: {
              postcssOptions: {
                plugins: [postcssPlugin()],
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

æ·»åŠ ä¾èµ–

å½“éœ€è¦åœ¨æ–‡ä»¶å˜åŒ–æ—¶è¿›è¡Œé‡æ–°ç¼–è¯‘æ—¶ï¼Œwebpack ä¸ºäº†ç†è§£è¿™æ ·çš„æ“ä½œéœ€è¦æ·»åŠ å¿…è¦çš„ä¾èµ–ã€‚

ç”±ä¸¤ç§æ–¹å¼æ·»åŠ ä¾èµ–ï¼š

  1. ï¼ˆæ¨èï¼‰ã€‚æ’ä»¶åœ¨ result.messages ä¸­è§¦å‘æ¶ˆæ¯ã€‚

æ¶ˆæ¯åº”è¯¥åŒ…å«ä¸‹é¢ä¸¤ä¸ªå­—æ®µï¼š

  • type = dependency - æ¶ˆæ¯ç±»å‹ï¼ˆå¿…éœ€å­—æ®µï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”åº”è¯¥ä¸º dependencyï¼‰
  • file - æ–‡ä»¶çš„ç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„ï¼ˆå¿…éœ€ï¼‰

webpack.config.js

const path = require("path");

const customPlugin = () => (css, result) => {
  result.messages.push({
    type: "dependency",
    file: path.resolve(__dirname, "path", "to", "file"),
  });
};

const postcssPlugin = postcss.plugin("postcss-assets", customPlugin);

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.css$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          "css-loader",
          {
            loader: "postcss-loader",
            options: {
              postcssOptions: {
                plugins: [postcssPlugin()],
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};
  1. åœ¨æ’ä»¶ä¸­ä¼ é€’ loaderContextã€‚

webpack.config.js

const path = require("path");

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.css$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          "css-loader",
          {
            loader: "postcss-loader",
            options: {
              postcssOptions: {
                config: path.resolve(__dirname, "path/to/postcss.config.js"),
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

postcss.config.js

module.exports = (api) => ({
  plugins: [
    require("path/to/customPlugin")({
      loaderContext: api.webpackLoaderContext,
    }),
  ],
});

customPlugin.js

const path = require("path");

const customPlugin = (loaderContext) => (css, result) => {
  loaderContext.webpack.addDependency(
    path.resolve(__dirname, "path", "to", "file")
  );
};

module.exports = postcss.plugin("postcss-assets", customPlugin);

è´¡çŒ®

å¦‚æœä½ è¿˜æ²¡æœ‰è¯»è¿‡æˆ‘ä»¬çš„è´¡çŒ®æŒ‡å—ï¼Œè¯·èŠ±ä¸€ç‚¹æ—¶é—´é˜…è¯»å®ƒã€‚

CONTRIBUTING

License

MIT

raw-loader

A loader for webpack that allows importing files as a String.

Getting Started

To begin, you'll need to install raw-loader:

$ npm install raw-loader --save-dev

Then add the loader to your webpack config. For example:

file.js

import txt from './file.txt';

webpack.config.js

// webpack.config.js
module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.txt$/i,
        use: 'raw-loader',
      },
    ],
  },
};

And run webpack via your preferred method.

Options

Name Type Default Description
esModule {Boolean} true Uses ES modules syntax

esModule

Type: Boolean Default: true

By default, raw-loader generates JS modules that use the ES modules syntax. There are some cases in which using ES modules is beneficial, like in the case of module concatenation and tree shaking.

You can enable a CommonJS module syntax using:

webpack.config.js

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.txt$/i,
        use: [
          {
            loader: 'raw-loader',
            options: {
              esModule: false,
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

Examples

Inline 

import txt from 'raw-loader!./file.txt';

Beware, if you already define loader(s) for extension(s) in webpack.config.js you should use:

import css from '!!raw-loader!./file.txt'; // Adding `!!` to a request will disable all loaders specified in the configuration

Contributing

Please take a moment to read our contributing guidelines if you haven't yet done so.

CONTRIBUTING

License

MIT

remark-loader

Load markdown through remark.

Usage

Simply add the loader to your configuration, and pass options.

import md from "markdown-file.md";
console.log(md);

webpack.config.js

import RemarkHTML from "remark-html";

module.exports = {
  // ...
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.md$/,
        use: [
          {
            loader: "html-loader",
          },
          {
            loader: "remark-loader",
            options: {
              remarkOptions: {
                plugins: [RemarkHTML],
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

Here's the full list of remark plugins.

We no longer support any react specific features. Please see the wonderful MDX project if you're interested in mixing JSX with Markdown.

Options

Name Type Default Description
remarkOptions {Object} {} Remark options
removeFrontMatter {Boolean} true Remove removeFrontMatter

remarkOptions

Name Type Default Description
plugins Array<String|Array> [] Allows to connect remark plugins
settings {Object} undefined Remark settings
data {Object} undefined Information available to all plugins

plugins

Type: Array<String\|Array> Default: []

Allows to connect remark plugins

String

webpack.config.js

import RemarkFrontmatter from "remark-frontmatter";

module.exports = {
  // ...
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.md$/,
        use: [
          {
            loader: "remark-loader",
            options: {
              remarkOptions: {
                plugins: [RemarkFrontmatter],
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};
Array

If need to specify options for the plugin, can pass the plugin using an array, where the second argument will be options.

webpack.config.js

import RemarkFrontmatter from "remark-frontmatter";
import RemarkBookmarks from "remark-bookmarks";

module.exports = {
  // ...
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.md$/,
        use: [
          {
            loader: "remark-loader",
            options: {
              remarkOptions: {
                plugins: [
                  RemarkFrontmatter,
                  [
                    RemarkBookmarks,
                    {
                      bookmarks: {
                        npm: "https://npmjs.com/package/remark-bookmarks",
                      },
                    },
                  ],
                ],
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

settings

Type: Object Default: undefined

Pass remark-stringify options and remark-parse options options to the remark.

webpack.config.js

module.exports = {
  // ...
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.md$/,
        use: [
          {
            loader: "remark-loader",
            options: {
              remarkOptions: {
                settings: {
                  bullet: "+",
                  listItemIndent: "1",
                },
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

data

Type: Object Default: undefined

Configure the remark with information available to all plugins. Information is stored in an in-memory key-value store.

webpack.config.js

function examplePluginUsingData() {
  console.log(this.data);
  // { alpha: 'bravo', charlie: 'delta' }
}

module.exports = {
  // ...
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.md$/,
        use: [
          {
            loader: "remark-loader",
            options: {
              remarkOptions: {
                plugins: [examplePluginUsingData],
                data: {
                  alpha: "bravo",
                  charlie: "delta",
                },
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

removeFrontMatter

Type: Boolean Default: true

By default, the frontMatter is removed. To override this behavior, set removeFrontMatter to false and add remark-frontmatter to plugins.

webpack.config.js

import RemarkFrontmatter from "remark-frontmatter";

module.exports = {
  // ...
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.md$/,
        use: [
          {
            loader: "remark-loader",
            options: {
              removeFrontMatter: false,
              remarkOptions: {
                plugins: [RemarkFrontmatter],
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

Inspiration

This project was inspired the following open source work:

  • react-markdown-loader
  • marksy

Examples

Markdown to HTML

To get html, need to add remark-html to the remark plugins and add html-loader to the webpack.config

import md from "markdown-file.md";
console.log(md);

webpack.config.js

import RemarkHTML from "remark-html";

module.exports = {
  // ...
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.md$/,
        use: [
          {
            loader: "html-loader",
          },
          {
            loader: "remark-loader",
            options: {
              remarkOptions: {
                plugins: [RemarkHTML],
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

Markdown to Markdown

index.js

import md from "markdown-file.md";
console.log(md);

webpack.config.js

module.exports = {
  // ...
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.md$/,
        use: [
          {
            loader: "remark-loader",
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

Contributing

Please take a moment to read our contributing guidelines if you haven't yet done so.

CONTRIBUTING

License

MIT

sass-loader

åŠ è½½ Sass/SCSS æ–‡ä»¶å¹¶å°†ä»–ä»¬ç¼–è¯‘ä¸º CSSã€‚

å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å§‹

é¦–å…ˆï¼Œä½ éœ€è¦å®‰è£… sass-loaderï¼š

npm install sass-loader sass webpack --save-dev

sass-loader éœ€è¦é¢„å…ˆå®‰è£… Dart Sass æˆ– Node Sassï¼ˆå¯ä»¥åœ¨è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªé“¾æ¥ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ°æ›´å¤šçš„èµ„æ–™ï¼‰ã€‚è¿™å¯ä»¥æ§åˆ¶æ‰€æœ‰ä¾èµ–çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œ å¹¶è‡ªç”±çš„é€‰æ‹©ä½¿ç”¨çš„ Sass å®ç°ã€‚

è¿™æ ·å¯ä»¥æ§åˆ¶æ‰€æœ‰ä¾èµ–é¡¹çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œå¹¶é€‰æ‹©è¦ä½¿ç”¨çš„ Sass å®ç°ã€‚

â„¹ï¸ æˆ‘ä»¬æ¨èä½¿ç”¨ Dart Sassã€‚

âš  Node Sass ä¸èƒ½ä¸ Yarn PnP ç‰¹æ€§ä¸€èµ·æ­£å¸¸å·¥ä½œã€‚

å°† sass-loader ã€css-loader ä¸ style-loader è¿›è¡Œé“¾å¼è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†æ ·å¼ä»¥ style æ ‡ç­¾çš„å½¢å¼æ’å…¥ DOM ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ–è€…ä½¿ç”¨ mini-css-extract-plugin å°†æ ·å¼è¾“å‡ºåˆ°ç‹¬ç«‹çš„æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ã€‚

ç„¶åå°†æœ¬ loader æ·»åŠ åˆ°ä½ çš„ Webpack é…ç½®ä¸­ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š

app.js

import "./style.scss";

style.scss

$body-color: red;

body {
  color: $body-color;
}

webpack.config.js

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/i,
        use: [
          // å°† JS å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç”Ÿæˆä¸º style èŠ‚ç‚¹
          "style-loader",
          // å°† CSS è½¬åŒ–æˆ CommonJS æ¨¡å—
          "css-loader",
          // å°† Sass ç¼–è¯‘æˆ CSS
          "sass-loader",
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

æœ€åé€šè¿‡ä½ å–œæ¬¢çš„æ–¹å¼è¿è¡Œ webpackã€‚

è§£æ import çš„è§„åˆ™

Webpack æä¾›ä¸€ç§ è§£ææ–‡ä»¶çš„é«˜çº§æœºåˆ¶ã€‚

sass-loader ä½¿ç”¨ Sass æä¾›çš„ custom importer ç‰¹æ€§ï¼Œå°†æ‰€æœ‰ query ä¼ é€’ç»™ Webpack è§£æå¼•æ“ã€‚åªè¦åœ¨åŒ…åå‰åŠ ä¸Š ~ ï¼Œå‘Šè¯‰ Webpack è¿™ä¸æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç›¸å¯¹è·¯å¾„ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å°±å¯ä»¥ä» node_modules ä¸­ import è‡ªå·±çš„ Sass æ¨¡å—äº†ï¼š

@import "~bootstrap";

é‡è¦çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œåªåœ¨å‰é¢åŠ ä¸Š ~ï¼Œå› ä¸º~/ å°†ä¼šè§£æåˆ°ç”¨æˆ·çš„ä¸»ç›®å½•ï¼ˆhome directoryï¼‰ã€‚ å› ä¸º CSS å’Œ Sass æ–‡ä»¶æ²¡æœ‰ç”¨äºå¯¼å…¥ç›¸å…³æ–‡ä»¶çš„ç‰¹æ®Šè¯­æ³•ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ Webpack éœ€è¦åŒºåˆ† bootstrap å’Œ ~bootstrapã€‚ @import "style.scss" å’Œ @import "./style.scss"; ä¸¤ç§å†™æ³•æ˜¯ç›¸åŒçš„ã€‚

url(...) çš„é—®é¢˜

ç”±äº Saass çš„å®ç°æ²¡æœ‰æä¾› url é‡å†™çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç›¸å…³çš„èµ„æºéƒ½å¿…é¡»æ˜¯ç›¸å¯¹äºè¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆouputï¼‰è€Œè¨€çš„ã€‚

  • å¦‚æœç”Ÿæˆçš„ CSS ä¼ é€’ç»™äº† css-loaderï¼Œåˆ™æ‰€æœ‰çš„ url è§„åˆ™éƒ½å¿…é¡»æ˜¯ç›¸å¯¹äºå…¥å£æ–‡ä»¶çš„ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šmain.scssï¼‰ã€‚
  • å¦‚æœä»…ä»…ç”Ÿæˆäº† CSS æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰å°†å…¶ä¼ é€’ç»™ css-loaderï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæ‰€æœ‰çš„ url éƒ½æ˜¯ç›¸å¯¹äºç½‘ç«™çš„æ ¹ç›®å½•çš„ã€‚

ç¬¬ä¸€ç§æƒ…å†µå¯èƒ½ä¼šå¸¦æ¥ä¸€äº›å›°æ‰°ã€‚é€šå¸¸æƒ…å†µä¸‹æˆ‘ä»¬å¸Œæœ›ç›¸å¯¹è·¯å¾„å¼•ç”¨çš„è§£ææ˜¯ç›¸å¯¹äºå£°æ˜å®ƒçš„ .sass/.scss æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆå¦‚åŒåœ¨ .css æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ä¸€æ ·ï¼‰ã€‚

å¹¸è¿çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œæœ‰ä¸¤ç§æ–¹æ³•å¯ä»¥è§£å†³è¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼š

  • å°† resolve-url-loader è®¾ç½®äº loader é“¾ä¸­çš„ sass-loader ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥é‡å†™ urlã€‚
  • Library ä½œè€…ä¸€èˆ¬éƒ½ä¼šæä¾›å˜é‡ï¼Œç”¨æ¥è®¾ç½®èµ„æºè·¯å¾„ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚ bootstrap-sass å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ $icon-font-path è¿›è¡Œè®¾ç½®ã€‚

é…ç½®é€‰é¡¹

åç§° ç±»å‹ é»˜è®¤å€¼ Description
implementation {Object} sass è®¾ç½®ä½¿ç”¨çš„ Sass çš„å®ç°ã€‚
sassOptions {Object|Function} Sass å®ç°çš„é»˜è®¤å€¼ Sass è‡ªèº«é€‰é¡¹ã€‚
sourceMap {Boolean} compiler.devtool å¯ç”¨ / ç¦ç”¨ source maps çš„ç”Ÿæˆã€‚
additionalData {String|Function} undefined åœ¨å®é™…çš„è¾“å…¥æ–‡ä»¶ä¹‹å‰æ·»åŠ  Sass /SCSS ä»£ç ã€‚
webpackImporter {Boolean} true å¯ç”¨ / ç¦ç”¨é»˜è®¤çš„ Webpack importerã€‚

implementation

ç±»å‹ï¼š Object é»˜è®¤å€¼ï¼š sass

ç‰¹æ®Šçš„ implementation é€‰é¡¹ç¡®å®šè¦ä½¿ç”¨çš„ Sass å®ç°ã€‚

é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œloader å°†ä¼šæ ¹æ®ä½ çš„ä¾èµ–è§£æéœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨çš„å®ç°ã€‚ åªéœ€å°†å¿…éœ€çš„å®ç°æ·»åŠ åˆ° package.jsonï¼ˆsass æˆ– node-sass åŒ…ï¼‰ä¸­å¹¶å®‰è£…ä¾èµ–é¡¹å³å¯ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶ sass-loader å°†ä¼šä½¿ç”¨ sass ï¼ˆdart-sassï¼‰å®ç°ï¼š

package.json

{
  "devDependencies": {
    "sass-loader": "^7.2.0",
    "sass": "^1.22.10"
  }
}

ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶ sass-loader å°†ä¼šä½¿ç”¨ node-sass å®ç°ï¼š

package.json

{
  "devDependencies": {
    "sass-loader": "^7.2.0",
    "node-sass": "^5.0.0"
  }
}

éœ€æ³¨æ„åŒæ—¶å®‰è£… node-sass å’Œ sass çš„æƒ…å†µï¼é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œsass-loader ä¼šé€‰æ‹© sassã€‚ ä¸ºäº†é¿å…è¿™ç§æƒ…å†µï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ implementation é€‰é¡¹ã€‚

implementation é€‰é¡¹å¯ä»¥ä»¥æ¨¡å—çš„å½¢å¼æ¥å— sassï¼ˆDart Sassï¼‰æˆ– node-sassã€‚

ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œä¸ºäº†ä½¿ç”¨ Dart Sassï¼Œä½ åº”è¯¥ä¼ é€’ï¼š

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          "css-loader",
          {
            loader: "sass-loader",
            options: {
              // `dart-sass` æ˜¯é¦–é€‰
              implementation: require("sass"),
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œå½“ä½¿ç”¨ sassï¼ˆDart Sassï¼‰æ—¶ï¼Œç”±äºå¼‚æ­¥å›è°ƒçš„å¼€é”€ï¼Œé€šå¸¸æƒ…å†µä¸‹åŒæ­¥ç¼–è¯‘çš„é€Ÿåº¦æ˜¯å¼‚æ­¥ç¼–è¯‘é€Ÿåº¦çš„ä¸¤å€ã€‚ ä¸ºäº†é¿å…è¿™ç§å¼€é”€ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ fibers åŒ…ä»åŒæ­¥ä»£ç ä¸­è°ƒç”¨å¼‚æ­¥å¯¼å…¥ç¨‹åºã€‚

å¦‚æœå¯èƒ½ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨æ³¨å…¥ fibers è½¯ä»¶åŒ…ï¼ˆè®¾ç½® sassOptions.fiberï¼‰ï¼ˆå½“ç„¶éœ€è¦ä½ å®‰è£… fibers åŒ…ï¼‰ã€‚

package.json

{
  "devDependencies": {
    "sass-loader": "^7.2.0",
    "sass": "^1.22.10",
    "fibers": "^4.0.1"
  }
}

ä½ å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å‘ sassOptions.fiber ä¼ é€’ false å‚æ•°å…³é—­è‡ªåŠ¨æ³¨å…¥çš„ fibers åŒ…ã€‚

webpack.config.js

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          "css-loader",
          {
            loader: "sass-loader",
            options: {
              implementation: require("sass"),
              sassOptions: {
                fiber: false,
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

ä½ è¿˜å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä¸€ä¸‹ä»£ç ä¼ é€’ fiberï¼š

webpack.config.js

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          "css-loader",
          {
            loader: "sass-loader",
            options: {
              implementation: require("sass"),
              sassOptions: {
                fiber: require("fibers"),
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

sassOptions

ç±»å‹ï¼šObject|Function é»˜è®¤å€¼ï¼šSass å®ç°çš„é»˜è®¤å€¼

Dart Sass æˆ–è€… Node Sass å®ç°çš„é€‰é¡¹ã€‚

â„¹ï¸ indentedSyntax é€‰é¡¹å€¼ä¸º trueï¼Œæ˜¯å¯¹ sass çš„æ‰©å±•ã€‚

â„¹ï¸ åƒ data å’Œ file è¿™æ ·çš„é€‰é¡¹æ˜¯ä¸å¯ç”¨çš„ï¼Œä¸”ä¼šè¢«å¿½ç•¥ã€‚

â„¹ æˆ‘ä»¬æ¨èä¸è¦è®¾ç½® outFileï¼ŒsourceMapContentsï¼ŒsourceMapEmbedï¼ŒsourceMapRoot è¿™äº›é€‰é¡¹ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå½“ sourceMap æ˜¯ true æ—¶ï¼Œsass-loader ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨è®¾ç½®è¿™äº›é€‰é¡¹ã€‚

â„¹ï¸ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ this.webpackLoaderContext å±æ€§è®¿é—®è‡ªå®šä¹‰ importer ä¸­çš„ loader ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ã€‚

sass ï¼ˆdart-sassï¼‰å’Œ node-sass ä¹‹é—´çš„é€‰é¡¹ç•¥æœ‰ä¸åŒã€‚

åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨ä»–ä»¬ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œè¯·æŸ¥é˜…æœ‰å…³æ–‡æ¡£ï¼š

  • Dart Sass æ–‡æ¡£ æä¾›äº†æ‰€æœ‰å¯ç”¨çš„ sass é€‰é¡¹ã€‚
  • Node Sass æ–‡æ¡£ æä¾›äº†æ‰€æœ‰å¯ç”¨çš„ node-sass é€‰é¡¹ã€‚

Object

ä½¿ç”¨å¯¹è±¡è®¾ç½® Sass å®ç°çš„å¯åŠ¨é€‰é¡¹ã€‚

webpack.config.js

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          "css-loader",
          {
            loader: "sass-loader",
            options: {
              sassOptions: {
                indentWidth: 4,
                includePaths: ["absolute/path/a", "absolute/path/b"],
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

Function

å…è®¸é€šè¿‡ loader ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ä¸º Sass å®ç°è®¾ç½®ä¸åŒçš„é€‰é¡¹ã€‚

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          "css-loader",
          {
            loader: "sass-loader",
            options: {
              sassOptions: (loaderContext) => {
                // æœ‰å…³å¯ç”¨å±æ€§çš„æ›´å¤šä¿¡æ¯ https://webpack.js.org/api/loaders/
                const { resourcePath, rootContext } = loaderContext;
                const relativePath = path.relative(rootContext, resourcePath);

                if (relativePath === "styles/foo.scss") {
                  return {
                    includePaths: ["absolute/path/c", "absolute/path/d"],
                  };
                }

                return {
                  includePaths: ["absolute/path/a", "absolute/path/b"],
                };
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

sourceMap

ç±»å‹ï¼šBoolean é»˜è®¤å€¼ï¼šå–å†³äº compiler.devtool çš„å€¼

å¼€å¯/å…³é—­ç”Ÿæˆ source mapã€‚

é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹ source maps çš„ç”Ÿæˆå–å†³äº devtool é€‰é¡¹ã€‚ é™¤ eval å’Œ false ä¹‹å¤–çš„æ‰€æœ‰å€¼éƒ½å°†å¼€å¯ source map çš„ç”Ÿæˆã€‚

â„¹ å¦‚æœä¸º true å°†ä¼šå¿½ç•¥æ¥è‡ª sassOptions çš„ sourceMapï¼ŒsourceMapRootï¼ŒsourceMapEmbedï¼ŒsourceMapContents å’Œ omitSourceMapUrl é€‰é¡¹ã€‚

webpack.config.js

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          {
            loader: "css-loader",
            options: {
              sourceMap: true,
            },
          },
          {
            loader: "sass-loader",
            options: {
              sourceMap: true,
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

â„¹ åœ¨æå°‘æ•°æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œnode-sass ä¼šè¾“å‡ºæ— æ•ˆçš„ source mapsï¼ˆè¿™æ˜¯ node-sass çš„ bugï¼‰ã€‚

ä¸ºäº†é¿å…è¿™ç§æƒ…å†µï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥å°è¯•å°† node-sass æ›´æ–°åˆ°æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œæˆ–è€…å¯ä»¥å°è¯•å°† sassOptions ä¸­çš„ outputStyle é€‰é¡¹è®¾ç½®ä¸º compressedã€‚

webpack.config.js

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          "css-loader",
          {
            loader: "sass-loader",
            options: {
              sourceMap: true,
              sassOptions: {
                outputStyle: "compressed",
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

additionalData

ç±»å‹ï¼šString|Function é»˜è®¤å€¼ï¼šundefined

åœ¨å®é™…çš„æ–‡ä»¶ä¹‹å‰è¦æ·»åŠ çš„ Sass / SCSS ä»£ç ã€‚ åœ¨è¿™ç§æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œsass-loader å°†ä¸ä¼šè¦†ç›– data é€‰é¡¹ï¼Œè€Œåªæ˜¯å°†å®ƒæ‹¼æ¥åœ¨å…¥å£æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹ä¹‹å‰ã€‚

å½“æŸäº› Sass å˜é‡å–å†³äºç¯å¢ƒæ—¶ï¼Œè¿™éå¸¸æœ‰ç”¨ï¼š

String 

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          "css-loader",
          {
            loader: "sass-loader",
            options: {
              additionalData: "$env: " + process.env.NODE_ENV + ";",
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

Function

Sync
module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          "css-loader",
          {
            loader: "sass-loader",
            options: {
              additionalData: (content, loaderContext) => {
                // æœ‰å…³å¯ç”¨å±æ€§çš„æ›´å¤šä¿¡æ¯ https://webpack.js.org/api/loaders/
                const { resourcePath, rootContext } = loaderContext;
                const relativePath = path.relative(rootContext, resourcePath);

                if (relativePath === "styles/foo.scss") {
                  return "$value: 100px;" + content;
                }

                return "$value: 200px;" + content;
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};
Async
module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          "css-loader",
          {
            loader: "sass-loader",
            options: {
              additionalData: async (content, loaderContext) => {
                // More information about available properties https://webpack.js.org/api/loaders/
                const { resourcePath, rootContext } = loaderContext;
                const relativePath = path.relative(rootContext, resourcePath);

                if (relativePath === "styles/foo.scss") {
                  return "$value: 100px;" + content;
                }

                return "$value: 200px;" + content;
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

webpackImporter

ç±»å‹ï¼šBoolean é»˜è®¤å€¼ï¼štrue

å¼€å¯ / å…³é—­é»˜è®¤çš„ Webpack importerã€‚

åœ¨æŸäº›æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æé«˜æ€§èƒ½ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯è¯·è°¨æ…ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå› ä¸º aliases å’Œä»¥ ã€œ å¼€å¤´çš„ @import è§„åˆ™å°†ä¸èµ·ä½œç”¨ã€‚ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä¼ é€’è‡ªå·±çš„ importer æ¥è§£å†³è¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼ˆå‚é˜… importer docsï¼‰ã€‚

webpack.config.js

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          "css-loader",
          {
            loader: "sass-loader",
            options: {
              webpackImporter: false,
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

ç¤ºä¾‹

æå–æ ·å¼è¡¨

å¯¹äºç”Ÿäº§ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å»ºè®®ä» bundle ä¸­æå– CSSï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿ä¹‹åå¯ä»¥ä½¿ CSS/JS èµ„æºå¹¶è¡ŒåŠ è½½ã€‚

ä» bundle ä¸­æå–æ ·å¼è¡¨ï¼Œæœ‰ 2 ç§å®ç”¨çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼š

  • mini-css-extract-pluginï¼ˆåœ¨ä½¿ç”¨ webpack 4 æ—¶ä½¿ç”¨æ­¤ pluginï¼Œå®ƒå°†é€‚ç”¨äºæ‰€æœ‰ç”¨ä¾‹ï¼‰
  • extract-loaderï¼ˆç®€å•ï¼Œä¸“é—¨é’ˆå¯¹ css-loader çš„è¾“å‡ºï¼‰

webpack.config.js

const MiniCssExtractPlugin = require("mini-css-extract-plugin");

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/i,
        use: [
          // åœ¨å¼€å‘è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å›é€€åˆ° style-loader
          process.env.NODE_ENV !== "production"
            ? "style-loader"
            : MiniCssExtractPlugin.loader,
          "css-loader",
          "sass-loader",
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
  plugins: [
    new MiniCssExtractPlugin({
      // ä¸ webpackOptions.output ä¸­çš„é€‰é¡¹ç›¸ä¼¼
      // æ‰€æœ‰çš„é€‰é¡¹éƒ½æ˜¯å¯é€‰çš„
      filename: "[name].css",
      chunkFilename: "[id].css",
    }),
  ],
};

Source maps

å¼€å¯/å…³é—­ source map çš„ç”Ÿæˆã€‚

ä¸ºäº†å¼€å¯ CSS source mapsï¼Œéœ€è¦å°† sourceMap é€‰é¡¹ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ï¼Œä¼ é€’ç»™ sass-loader å’Œ css-loaderã€‚

webpack.config.js

module.exports = {
  devtool: "source-map", // ä»»ä½•ç±»ä¼¼äº "source-map" çš„é€‰é¡¹éƒ½æ˜¯æ”¯æŒçš„
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/i,
        use: [
          "style-loader",
          {
            loader: "css-loader",
            options: {
              sourceMap: true,
            },
          },
          {
            loader: "sass-loader",
            options: {
              sourceMap: true,
            },
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
};

å¦‚æœä½ è¦åœ¨ Chrome ä¸­ç¼–è¾‘åŸå§‹çš„ Sass æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå»ºè®®é˜…è¯» è¿™ç¯‡ä¸é”™çš„åšå®¢ã€‚å…·ä½“ç¤ºä¾‹å‚è€ƒ test/sourceMapã€‚

è´¡çŒ®

å¦‚æœä½ è¿˜æ²¡æœ‰é˜…è¯»è¿‡æˆ‘ä»¬çš„è´¡çŒ®æŒ‡å—ï¼Œè¯·èŠ±ä¸€ç‚¹æ—¶é—´é˜…è¯»å®ƒã€‚

CONTRIBUTING
